description.@en: A pale white nimbus of light surrounds you, protecting you from harm.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, both Grievous and Serious Injuries inflicted upon you are treated as Moderate Injuries instead for the Duration of the spell.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and you are immune to Damage inflicted by melee weapons.

criticalFailure.@en: Your Magick goes terribly awry, as the Wind is knocked out of you. You suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril and are left Defenseless for the spellâ€™s Duration.

reagents.@en: An iron ring, forged in purifying flames
